Hendee served in several leadership positions with the district, including principal at Zia Middle School and Las Cruces High School. Most recently, he was the Executive Director of Teaching and Learning before retiring in August 2019. His wife, Susie, is the principal at Centennial High School.

“Jed Hendee will be remembered as a leader, a fighter and a compassionate member of the LCPS family for 12 years,” said district superintendent Dr. Karen Trujillo. “We will continue to support Susie and the Hendee family through this difficult time.

Tonight I finished recording The Phantom Tollbooth (20 chapters). It truly is a great book and I really enjoyed it. The links are not public, but can be found at the LCPS Enrichment Channel. If you have never read this book, I highly recommend it. Unfortunately, it is often seen as a children's book and ignored but older students and adults. There are so many valuable lessons, high level vocabulary, mathematical reasoning and philosophical ideas. Like all books, it is best if you buy the book, but if you just want to listen, check it out. (please try to get past the first few chapters where I didn't know what I was doing and was a 'talking head' :) )

There are also so many other amazing resources here for that extra enrichment parents are looking for to keep children engaged and able to learn about things that interest them. Check it out!

As part of Governor Michelle Lujan Grisham’s initiative to increase Youth Career and College Readiness Opportunities, the New Mexico Department of Workforce Solutions and New Mexico Workforce Connection Centers will be encouraging and supporting high schools around the state in providing mock interview opportunities for students.

The goal of Mock It Till You Rock It! is to provide students throughout New Mexico with the opportunity to enhance their soft skills, and to help reduce the stress and anxiety that may surround a young person during their first interview, whether it’s for college or a career. We hope to boost confidence by acknowledging strengths during interviews, along with providing constructive feedback in a low-stress environment.
